mapper.select: select id, IFNULL(title, '') as title, IFNULL(contents, '') as contents, IFNULL(author, '') as author, modifiedDate from posts
mapper.insert: insert into posts values (#{id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{author}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update posts set title = #{dto.title}, contents = #{dto.contents}, modifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
